channel.title: XML Historical Foreign Exchange Rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) (14 Jan 2019)
channel.description: XML historical foreign exchange rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) from the Float Rates. Published at 14 Jan 2019.
